Holger Ferstl sent me an email a while ago with this link:

http://sephi.axinom.de/Blog/

It's based on SharpNEAT. Check out the pictures in the blog entry, very 
complex and colourful. I'm not sure how he encoded for color though. Now 
what would be *really* cool is if we could create some kind of live 
evolving animation based on this stuff. I know there is stuff out there 
that generates organic looking art that changes based on an audio input, 
but it would be nice to see anyway.

Colin.
